header.content: The API for common file system operations. Arguments set at the API level acts as defaults for the action arguments. All arguments used by the actions can be set. Furthermove, they remain for the lifetime of the pipeline.

value.name: repo
value.description: The repository the file is in.

value.name: dir
value.description: The directory the file is in.

value.name: path
value.description: The file or folder path in 3 space delimited parts.

value.name: uri
value.description: The file or folder path in uri format in one part.

value.name: from
value.description: The repository the file is in.

value.name: to
value.description: The repository the file is in.
